# 1. Importations des donn√©es
```{r,include=FALSE}
rm(list = ls())
packages <- c("readxl", "openxlsx", "dplyr", "corrplot")
install_if_missing <- function(pkg) {
  if (!requireNamespace(pkg, quietly = TRUE)) {
    install.packages(pkg)
  }
}
lapply(packages, install_if_missing)
library(readxl)
library(openxlsx)
library(dplyr)
library(corrplot)
library(ggplot2)

file_path_data <- file.choose()
df <- read_excel(file_path_data)
```

```{r}
# === 3. Pr√©paration des variables ===
df$`Outil OCR` <- as.factor(df$`Outil OCR`)
df$Cat√©gorie <- as.factor(df$Cat√©gorie)
df$`Dur√©e outil (minutes)` <- as.numeric(df$`Dur√©e outil (minutes)`)
df$`Caract√®res par minute`<- as.numeric(df$`Caract√®res par minute`)
```

# 2. Graphique CER/WER

```{r}
# üìä WER moyen par outil OCR
ggplot(df, aes(x = `Outil OCR`, y = WER, fill = `Outil OCR`)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Distribution du WER par Outil OCR", y = "WER")

# üìä CER moyen par outil OCR
ggplot(df, aes(x = `Outil OCR`, y = CER, fill = `Outil OCR`)) +

  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Distribution du CER par Outil OCR", y = "CER")

```
